frameDefinitions: This frame contains  words for Individuals as viewed in terms of their vocation.
This frame is concerned with nouns that denote Units of measurement for volumes.
A Miner attempts to obtain a desirable Resource, rocks and minerals, located in a Place being mined, by digging or tunneling in the ground.
This frame contains transparent nouns (and some adjectives) denoting quantities of a Mass or of Individuals.
The words in this frame describe the manipulation of an Entity by an Agent.
An Employer employs an Employee whose Position entails that the Employee perform certain Tasks in exchange for Compensation.
frameExamples: Greg drank two 2 liter <t><fex name='Unit'>bottles</fex></t> of lemonade.
He found them in the <t>deluge</t> of papers on his desk.
I <t>employed</t> him as Chief Gardener for ten years.
listRoleDefinitions: The <fen>Person</fen> is the human being.
The number of <fen>Unit</fen>s of the measured volume.
The <fen>Stuff</fen> whose volume is being measured.
The standardized quantity in terms of which other quantities of the same kind are  measured.
The <fen>Miner</fen> searches for mineral <fen>Resource</fen>s.
The <fen>Resource</fen> is usually buried in the ground, and is searched for by the <fen>Miner</fen>.
The time at which the <fen>Miner</fen> obtains the <fen>Resource</fen>.
The location in which the <fen>Miner</fen> searches for the <fen>Resource</fen>
The <fen>Quantity</fen>-denoting <t>Target</t> word.
A substance that is being quantified.
A collection of entities.

The <fen>Agent</fen> manipulates an object. <fen>Agent</fen> typically refers to animate beings, but is also extended to mechanical and other inanimate objects.  <fen>Agent</fen> is most frequently expressed as the external argument of verbs:
The <fen>Entity</fen> being manipulated often occurs as the direct object of verbs:

The part of the <fen>Agent</fen>'s body being used to manipulate the <fen>Entity</fen> may also be expressed. While the default is for an <fen>Agent</fen> to use his/her hands, other body parts may be specified. This frame element usually occurs as a PP-complement.
When the manipulation takes place
The spatial setting in which the manipulation takes place.
The role <fen>Employee</fen> denotes the person who is obligated to perform some <fen>Task</fen> in order to receive <fen>Compensation</fen>.
The <fen>Employer</fen> is the person (or institution) that gives <fen>Compensation</fen> to an <fen>Employee</fen>.
The role <fen>Field</fen> identifies the field in which the <fen>Employee</fen> is employed.
The role <fen>Position</fen> indicates a particular type of employment.
The <fen>Task</fen> indicates the action/duty that the <fen>Employee</fen> is obligated to do for the <fen>Employer</fen>.
The role <fen>Time</fen> identifies the time at whcih the <fen>Employer</fen> hires the <fen>Employee</fen>.
The role <fen>Place</fen> identifies the location where the <fen>Employer</fen> hires the <fen>Employee</fen>.
listRoleExamples: Serena found <fex>two</fex> <fex>cups</fex> of sugar in the freezer.
Sue bought three <fex>bottles</fex> <fex>of milk</fex> on sale.
Drink two <fex>glasses</fex> of wine every day.
A modicum <fex>of seepage on the floor</fex> is to be expected.
A number <fex>of concerned citizens</fex> have raised objections.
<fex>A robot arm</fex> grasps the box on the conveyor belt and seals it.
Squeeze <fex>the ball</fex> as many times as you can.
Kim grasped the needle <fex>between finger and thumb</fex>.
I seized the letter <fex>before he did</fex>.
<fex>In the hallway</fex> he managed to grabthe monarch by the ankles
<fex>I</fex> was employed by an international corporation.
<fex>I</fex> employed him as Chief Gardener for ten years.
He was employed<fex>in finance</fex> fourteen years ago.
I am employed <fex>to collect the trash</fex>.
Charles has been an employee of Microsoft <fex>since 1998</fex>!
Actually, he employed me <fex> at the downtown office </fex>.
